name: CHIP-8 Snake (Kiëd Llaentenn)
description:
A simple XO-CHIP snake game hacked up for the Octojam 8 in a day or two. Heavily inspired by the snake demo for cel7. You can view the source on GitHub as well.

To play, use WASD or the arrow keys, and reset a failed game with space or E. Keep munching apples until you find the white one.
